transcript:
so far. Behind Her in the door- way appeared a student with a crimson coat collar, an officer of the Guards, a girl of fifteen, and a plump rosy-faced boy in a short jacket. 
The count jumped up and, swaying from side to side, spread his arms wide and threw them round the little girl who had run in. 
"Ah, here she is!" he exclaimed laughing. "My pet, whose name day it is. My dear pet!" 
"Ma chtre, there is a time for everything," said the countess with feigned severity. "You spoil her, Ilya,
